input_text.Prompt:
Using the item specifications and item name, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item name:
Storm

Item specifications:
A Bowen Designs Sculpture!
Detailed sculpture of Storm from the X-Men franchise in white constume
Statue measures 12" Tall
Sculpted by Mark Newman, Gabe Perna, and Randy Bowen
input_text.Response A: I don't know much about this product, but it sounds interesting! Can you tell me more about the specifications and why it is unique compared to other similar products or services on the market?
input_text.Response B: Storm, a Bowen Designs sculpture, is an incredibly detailed sculpture of the X-Men franchise's Storm in her white costume.  This statue measures 12" Tall and was sculpted by Mark Newman, Gabe Perna, and Randy Bowen.  Storm is poised with arms spread, ready to harness the power of a raging storm.  The attention to detail on this sculpture is truly stunning.  From the flowing fabric of her costume to the individual strands of Storm's hair, this is a work of art that will be a treasured addition to any collection.  Purchase Storm today and harness the power of the storm!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
